text: Juan Carlos Esguerra Portocarrero (born March 13, 1949) is a Colombian lawyer and politician. He has served in the Colombian Government as the 7th Minister of Justice and Law, the 28th Ambassador of Colombia to the United States, and as Minister of National Defence. Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian politicians Category:Colombian lawyers Category:Ambassadors to the United States
title: Juan Carlos Esguerra Portocarrero
